question: Given atomic masses: Li(7), Na(23), K(39), Cl(35.5), Br(80), I(127), Ca(40), Sr(88), Ba(137). Which of the following doesn't form triad?
explanation: Dobereiner's triads are groups of chemically similar elements.
Cl (Halogen), K (Alkali), Ca (Alkaline earth) - chemically dissimilar. Not a triad.
